verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Jonath elem rehokim. A Mikhtam of David,) (when the Philistines seized him in Gath.) Be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, O God, <S%H430><s%> for man <S%H582><s%> has trampled <S%H9575><s%> upon me; Fighting <S%H3898><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long he oppresses <S%H3905><s%> me.
My foes <S%H9596><s%> have trampled <S%H9575><s%> upon me all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long, For they are many <S%H7227><s%> who fight <S%H3898><s%> proudly <S%H4791><s%> against me.
When <S%H3117><s%> I am afraid, <S%H3372><s%> I will put <S%H982><s%> my trust <S%H982><s%> in Thee.

In God, <S%H430><s%> whose word <S%H1697><s%> I praise, <S%H1984><s%> In God <S%H430><s%> I have put <S%H982><s%> my trust; <S%H982><s%> I shall not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> can [mere] man <S%H1320><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me?
All <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long they distort <S%H6087><s%> my words; <S%H1697><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are against <S%H5921><s%> me for evil. <S%H9563><s%>
They attack, <S%H9075><s%> they lurk, <S%H6845><s%> They watch <S%H8104><s%> my steps, <S%H6119><s%> As they have waited <S%H6960><s%> [to take] my life. <S%H5315><s%>

Because <S%H5921><s%> of wickedness, <S%H205><s%> cast <S%H6405><s%> them forth, <S%H6405><s%> In anger <S%H639><s%> put <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> O God! <S%H430><s%>
Thou hast taken <S%H5608><s%> account <S%H5608><s%> of my wanderings; <S%H5112><s%> Put <S%H7760><s%> my tears <S%H1832><s%> in Thy bottle; <S%H4997><s%> Are [they] not in Thy book <S%H9374><s%>?

Then <S%H227><s%> my enemies <S%H340><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I call; <S%H7121><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> I know, <S%H3045><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> is for me.
In God, <S%H430><s%> [whose] word <S%H1697><s%> I praise, <S%H1984><s%> In the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [whose] word <S%H1697><s%> I praise, <S%H1984><s%>
In God <S%H430><s%> I have put <S%H982><s%> my trust, <S%H982><s%> I shall not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> can man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me?
Thy vows <S%H5088><s%> are [binding] upon me, O God; <S%H430><s%> I will render <S%H9608><s%> thank <S%H8426><s%> offerings <S%H8426><s%> to Thee.

For Thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> Indeed <S%H3808><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> from stumbling, <S%H1762><s%> So that I may walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> In the light <S%H216><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
